alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:29PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Breathitt and southwestern Magoffin Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rousseau, or 7 miles east of Jackson, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Guage, Camp Lewis and Lunah around 335 PM EDT. Cornelia around 340 PM EDT. Lambric, Eugene, Puncheon, Daisydell and Seiltz around 345 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Foraker, Hendricks, Fritz, Carver Station, Carver, Tiptop, Duco and Evanston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
